title: Sculpture materials
subTitle: What you need to start
author: Gustavo Afonso
text: you will need some modeling tools and a modeling material, this can range from iron to marble tools or delicate metal tools to oil clays

title: Painting tips
subTitle: what does it take to make a good painting
author: Gustavo Afonso

title: Using Silicone
subTitle: What you need to start
author: Gustavo Afonso
text: Never mix two different brands of silicone, this can be very unfortunate.
